definition: vegetable or food basket/(fig.) food supply
using a wicker basket to draw water (idiom); wasted effort

sentences.chinese: 禮品籃都是我們的業務。

sentences.english: An overflowing laundry basket stares menacingly from the corner of the room.
sentences.chinese: 房間角落裏，裝得滿滿的洗衣籃不懷好意地盯着我。

sentences.english: Microcosmic space is the hollow ball that has limit, it is not the ball of Poincare conjecture.
sentences.chinese: 選擇大型籃或妨礙爲此，一個有很多空洞空間。

sentences.english: There may be stores that specifically make gift baskets listed in the phone book.
sentences.chinese: 可能有專門店在電話中作禮品籃上市書。
但我們的“收文籃”當然是永遠不會空的。

sentences.english: Set up an appropriative cleaning basket, to improve the cleaning effect.
sentences.chinese: 設有專用清洗籃，提高清洗效果。

sentences.english: A few days later, the villagers were surprised to see the old basket-maker standing outside the church.
sentences.chinese: 幾天後，村民們驚奇地看到老制籃商站在教堂的外面。

sentences.english: When lam away, please help to check my in-tray .
sentences.chinese: 我不在的時間，請幫我查看我的收文籃。

sentences.english: They strip it with their mandibles and pack it into the pollen baskets on their legs.
sentences.chinese: 它用上顎把蜂膠剝下來，把它放進它腿上的花粉籃裏。

sentences.english: Most of us postpone relaxation until our “inbasket4” is empty.
sentences.chinese: 我們很多人把放鬆推遲到我們的“收文籃”清空之後。

sentences.english: Stainer basket shall be type 316 stainless steel.
sentences.chinese: 過濾器籃材質應該是316不鏽鋼。

sentences.english: Most of us postpone relaxation until our "in-basket" is empty.
sentences.chinese: 我們很多人把放鬆推遲到我們的“收文籃”清空之後。

sentences.english: Several baskets of fruit were eaten at the party.
sentences.chinese: 宴會上，大家喫掉了好幾籃水果。

sentences.english: The less power that you use in your arms the more accurate your shot will be.
sentences.chinese: 胳膊用的力越小，籃投得就越準。

sentences.english: Select a row in the in-basket by clicking it.
sentences.chinese: 通過單擊操作，在收文籃裏選擇一個行。

sentences.english: The ball hit the rim of the basket and seemed to hang there for a moment, and then it fell through the basket.
sentences.chinese: 球觸及籃的邊緣，似乎掛有一會兒，然後摔進了籃子。

definition: to push aside with the hand, foot, a stick etc/to dial/to allocate/to set aside (money)/to poke (the fire)/to pluck (a string instrument)/to turn round/classifier: group, batch
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
